addons.name: BlueMap
addons.remoteDescription: Displays QuickShop-Hikari shops as markers on your BlueMap web map.

addons.name: DiscordSRV
addons.remoteDescription: Sends real-time shop notifications and updates to players via DiscordSRV embeds and DMs.

addons.name: Discount
addons.remoteDescription: Adds configurable discount codes that apply percentage discounts to selected shops or players.

addons.name: DisplayControl
addons.remoteDescription: Lets players control whether virtual display items are shown on their client, including auto-detection for Bedrock.

addons.name: Dynmap
addons.remoteDescription: Shows shops as markers on your Dynmap instance with customizable icons and labels.

addons.name: EcoEnchants
addons.remoteDescription: Allows ItemExpression to target specific EcoEnchants items when configuring shops.

addons.name: Limited
addons.remoteDescription: Adds per-player shop limits so you can cap how many shops each user can create or own.

addons.name: List
addons.remoteDescription: Provides listing commands to view your shops and discover other shops on the server.

addons.name: Plan
addons.remoteDescription: Integrates QuickShop-Hikari data with the Plan analytics plugin for richer statistics.

addons.name: Reforges
addons.remoteDescription: Adds compatibility for items from the Reforges plugin when used in QuickShop-Hikari shops.

addons.name: Reremake Migrator
addons.remoteDescription: Helps migrate shop data and settings from QuickShop-Reremake into QuickShop-Hikari.

addons.name: ShopItemOnly
addons.remoteDescription: Prevents players from storing non-shop items in shop containers, checking on closes and hopper transfers.

compatibility.name: AdvancedRegionMarket
compatibility.remoteDescription: Adds AdvancedRegionMarket support and removes shops automatically when regions are removed or restored.

compatibility.name: AngelChest
compatibility.remoteDescription: Integrates with AngelChest so QuickShop-Hikari respects its death chest handling.

compatibility.name: BentoBox
compatibility.remoteDescription: Adds BentoBox support, letting island owners control shops and cleaning them up when islands or team members change.

compatibility.name: BungeeCord-Geyser
compatibility.remoteDescription: A BungeeCord bridge that exposes Geyser/Floodgate player status to backend QuickShop-Hikari servers.

compatibility.name: BungeeCord
compatibility.remoteDescription: BungeeCord bridge that forwards QuickShop-Hikari chat and command input between proxy and backend servers.

compatibility.name: ChestProtect
compatibility.remoteDescription: Prevents accidental ChestProtect protection removal and blocks shop creation on protected containers.

compatibility.name: Clearlag
compatibility.remoteDescription: Stops Clearlag from purging QuickShop-Hikari real display items.

compatibility.name: EliteMobs
compatibility.remoteDescription: Disallows trading items with EliteMobs soulbound enchantments to prevent scams.

compatibility.name: GreifPrevention
compatibility.remoteDescription: Integrates with GriefPrevention claims for shop access checks and removes shops when claims or trusts change.

compatibility.name: ItemsAdder
compatibility.remoteDescription: Enables ItemExpression to target specific ItemsAdder items for shop configuration.

compatibility.name: Lands
compatibility.remoteDescription: Adds Lands support for shop permission checks and optional automatic shop deletion on permission loss.

compatibility.name: OpenInv
compatibility.remoteDescription: Allows players to use their EnderChest as the backing container for a shop.

compatibility.name: PlotSquared
compatibility.remoteDescription: Registers quickshop-create and quickshop-trade flags in PlotSquared v6 and can delete shops when users are untrusted.

compatibility.name: Residence
compatibility.remoteDescription: Adds Residence flags for shop creation and trading and lets residence owners control all shops in their claims.

compatibility.name: Slimefun
compatibility.remoteDescription: Enables ItemExpression support for selecting specific Slimefun items in shops.

compatibility.name: SuperiorSkyBlock
compatibility.remoteDescription: Integrates with SuperiorSkyBlock, giving island owners control over island shops and optional cleanup when members leave.

compatibility.name: Towny
compatibility.remoteDescription: Adds nation and town shops that use Towny tax accounts and optional bank mode for controlled pricing.

compatibility.name: Velocity
compatibility.remoteDescription: Velocity bridge plugin that forwards QuickShop-Hikari player input over the quickshop:bungee channel.

compatibility.name: WorldEdit
compatibility.remoteDescription: Deletes shops in edited WorldEdit regions to avoid leaving ghost shops behind.

compatibility.name: WorldGuard
compatibility.remoteDescription: Registers create and trade flags in WorldGuard and can limit the number of shops per region.
